title: Bondi massacre father's desperate fight to save daughter | 7NEWS
description: Ten-year-old Matilda was fatally shot during a massacre at a Hanukkah festival at Bondi Pavilion, where gunmen opened fire on families celebrating the Jewish Festival of Lights. Her father Michael desperately tried to save her life at the scene, holding her as she struggled to breathe before she was evacuated. The Ukrainian family, who moved to Australia seeking safety, are now demanding answers from the Albanese government, saying it failed their daughter and all victims of the attack. title: Reindeer spotted running along busy San Fernando freeway in California
description: A reindeer has been spotted running along a busy San Fernando freeway in California on Saturday, December 13. California Department of Transportation vehicles worked to herd the animal as Highway Patrol received a phone call alerting that two reindeers were walking down the Interstate 5 South. #reindeer #christmas #highway #California #animals

title: Bondi gunman charged as calls for accountability grow | 7NEWS
description: Naveed Akram has been charged with 59 offences including terrorism, murder and placing explosives over the Bondi Beach massacre that killed 15 people. Funerals are being held for victims including 10-year-old Matilda Britvan and 87-year-old Holocaust survivor Alex Clayton, while questions mount over how the gunman slipped through security cracks despite being on an ASIO watch list since 2019. Former treasurer Josh Frydenberg has called for Prime Minister Anthony Albanese to accept personal responsibility and establish a royal commission into the attack. title: Riot police called in to stop teen brawl
description: Riot police have been mobilised after hundreds of teenagers swarmed a supermarket in Mordialloc and started a brawl in Melbourne's southeast. #teenager #police #riotpolice #melbourne #mordialloc

title: Bondi terrorist charged with 59 offences including murder | 7NEWS
description: Bondi terrorist Naveed Akram faces 59 charges including 15 for murder following the attack at Bondi Beach that was likely inspired by ISIS. The 24-year-old has emerged from a coma and been questioned by police, with legal experts predicting a complex trial process that could take two to three years. The international investigation will examine connections across multiple countries including the Philippines and Middle Eastern nations where ISIS operates. title: Frydenberg demands royal commission into antisemitism | 7NEWS
description: Former Treasurer Josh Frydenberg calls for a Royal Commission into the rise of anti-Semitism in Australia following the Bondi Beach terrorist attack. Frydenberg criticises the government's response over the past two years, arguing that authorities failed to act on warnings about radical Islamic ideology and hate speech despite repeated calls for action. He describes the attack as the deadliest terrorist attack in Australia's history and demands accountability from the Prime Minister and Home Affairs Minister. title: Woman arrested over Melbourne bomb threat
description: A 44-year-old woman has been arrested after police found homemade explosives and a 3D printed gun in a Toorak property in Melbourne's inner suburbs. #police #crime #investigation #toorak #melbourne

title: Tradie shortage threatens Brisbane 2032 Olympics | 7NEWS
description: Brisbane faces a critical shortage of tradies that threatens the completion of 2032 Olympics infrastructure projects. Construction Skills Queensland reports an average shortage of 18,000 trades annually until 2032, peaking at 50,000 by 2026-2027 when most Olympic venues should be under construction. Deputy Premier Jarrod Blay plans to recruit trades from interstate and overseas to address the crisis, though concerns remain about cost blowouts to the $7.1 billion budget. title: Melbourne bandits steal $10,000 worth of booze
description: Police have released CCTV footage of serial booze thieves who have stolen more than $10,000 worth of alcohol in Melbourne since October. #thief #theft #bottleshop #melbourne #police

title: Volunteer firefighter killed by falling tree
description: A 34-year-old farmer and volunteer fighter has died after his vehicle was struck by a falling tree near Mindarabin, north of Albany in Western Australia's south. #firefighter #fire #mindarabin #albany #westernaustralia

title: HSC results released across NSW and ACT | 7NEWS
description: Year 12 students across New South Wales and the ACT are receiving their HSC results today through digital envelopes via email and SMS. Students will also receive their ATAR scores, while school rankings for the entire state become available at midday.
